Text: I used on a HP Laptop and It bricked my OS. There wasnt much I could have done wrong so I dunno just beware with using this
it should be working just fine, it works on my HP lappy =)

Thanks, worked like a charm. I should mention it requires a restart before it'll fully activate.
I had actually bought Windows 7, and I installed it only to learn "my product key is not valid for installation". Thanks a lot, Microsoft. Lesson learned: pirate everything.
